document_data.caption: ''[[Annam All-Father]] playing a game of ''wah-ree'' with [[Garyx]].''
document_data.name: ''Wah-ree''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wah-ree''''' was an ancient abstract strategy board game in [[Faer√ªn]], popular among [[giant]]s and played even by some of the gods.
document_data.History:
Legends stated that the game of ''wah-ree'' was invented by the gods themselves.

The myths of the giants state that early in the history of the world, after [[Thousand Year War|thousands of years of war]] between the giants and the [[dragon]]s, the god of giants, [[Annam All-Father]], made a truce with the god [[Garyx]] by agreeing with the dragon god to settle the war with a game of ''wah-ree''. So skilled were the two opponents, that game ended in a stalemate. Because of this result the war came to an end, but the dragons were allowed to keep the territory they had conquered.

Another giant legend tells of two [[verbeeg]]s who played a single game of ''wah-ree'' over a 40 year period!
